Interface PlayStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
AIStrategy, DefensiveStrategy, HumanStrategy, OffensiveStrategy
public interface PlayStrategy
Interface for player decision-making strategies. Implements the Strategy design pattern for flexible player behavior.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hazri and Sophea

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    chooseCard(Offer offer)
    Chooses which card to take from an offer.
    Offer
    chooseOffer(Player player)
    Creates an offer from the player's hand.
    Offer
    selectOffer(List<Offer> offers)
    Selects an offer to take a card from.

  • Method Details

    • chooseOffer

      Offer chooseOffer(Player player)
      Creates an offer from the player's hand. Decides which card to place face-up and which face-down.
      Parameters:
      player - The player making the offer
      Returns:
      The created offer

    • selectOffer

      Offer selectOffer(List<Offer> offers)
      Selects an offer to take a card from.
      Parameters:
      offers - List of available offers
      Returns:
      The selected offer

    • chooseCard

      boolean chooseCard(Offer offer)
      Chooses which card to take from an offer.
      Parameters:
      offer - The offer to take from
      Returns:
      true to take face-up card, false for face-down
